pvardefs.name: pDocVersion
pvardefs.desc: Low 16 bits = document version, high 16 bit = platform code

pvardefs.name: pDocSelStart
pvardefs.desc: current start selection

pvardefs.name: pDocSelEnd
pvardefs.desc: current end selection

pvardefs.name: pDocView
pvardefs.desc: 0=Normal , 1=Page , 2=Field

pvardefs.name: pDocScale
pvardefs.desc: document scale (default 100%)

pvardefs.name: pDocUserData
pvardefs.desc: (unknown type)

pvardefs.name: pDocDefTabPos
pvardefs.desc: default document tab position when no paragraph tabs specified

pvardefs.name: pDocEvalCalcs
pvardefs.desc: if true, document calculations are in an evaluated state

pvardefs.name: pPaperOrientation
pvardefs.desc: Orientation

pvardefs.name: pPaperSize
pvardefs.desc: standard windows papersize see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd319099(v=vs.85).aspx

pvardefs.name: pPaperLength
pvardefs.desc: Length of paper in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperWidth
pvardefs.desc: Width of paper in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperLeftMargin
pvardefs.desc: Left paper margin in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperRightMargin
pvardefs.desc: Right paper margin in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperTopMargin
pvardefs.desc: Top paper margin in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperBottomMargin
pvardefs.desc: Bottom paper margin in mm/1000

pvardefs.name: pPaperContinues
pvardefs.desc: if true, OWrite displays one continues paper, regardless of pPaperLength

pvardefs.name: pDocStyles
pvardefs.desc: list of document styles

pvardefs.name: pDocHeaderMargin
pvardefs.desc: Margin of headers from paper edge in 1000/mm

pvardefs.name: pDocFooterMargin
pvardefs.desc: Margin of footers from paper edge in 1000/mm

pvardefs.name: pDocHeadFootOddEven
pvardefs.desc: Enables seperate headers and footers for odd and even pages

pvardefs.name: pDocHeadFootFirstPage
pvardefs.desc: Enables seperate headers and footers for first and subsequent pages

pvardefs.name: pGroupType
pvardefs.desc: one of the following kGroupType... constants (see class vars)

pvardefs.name: pObjType
pvardefs.desc: One of the kWriObjType... constants

pvardefs.name: pObjChildList
pvardefs.desc: List of paragraphs child objects, i.e images, calculations, etc.

pvardefs.name: pObjData
pvardefs.desc: Raw text data (includes place holder chars for child objects)

pvardefs.name: pObjStylesList
pvardefs.desc: Style information for this paragraph

pvardefs.name: pObjIsPageBreak
pvardefs.desc: If true, paragraph is a pagebreak

pvardefs.name: pObjType
pvardefs.desc: One of the kWriObjType... constants

pvardefs.name: pObjPos
pvardefs.desc: objects character position within paragraph

pvardefs.name: pObjWidth
pvardefs.desc: fixed width value in micrometres (0.001 mm), if zero no fixed width

pvardefs.name: pObjHeight
pvardefs.desc: fixed height value in micrometres (0.001 mm), if zero no fixed height

pvardefs.name: pObjGenClick
pvardefs.desc: if true click calculation will be executed when user click the field

pvardefs.name: pObjStripEmpty
pvardefs.desc: if true, empty lines are stripped from result

pvardefs.name: pObjShowRTF
pvardefs.desc: if true, field will show RTF based calculation in marked-up format

pvardefs.name: pObjShowingRTF
pvardefs.desc: if true, field is currently showing RTF based calculation in marked-up format

pvardefs.name: pObjFillColor
pvardefs.desc: fill color used in un-evaluated state

pvardefs.name: pObjName
pvardefs.desc: object's name

pvardefs.name: pObjDisplay
pvardefs.desc: text displayed in un-evaluated state

pvardefs.name: pObjCalc
pvardefs.desc: the object's calculation

pvardefs.name: pObjToolTip
pvardefs.desc: object's tool-tip text

pvardefs.name: pObjClickCalc
pvardefs.desc: calculation that is executed when user clicks the field

pvardefs.name: pObjUserData
pvardefs.desc: user data for developer's use

pvardefs.name: pStyles
pvardefs.desc: List (single row) containing style information

pvardefs.name: pDocument
pvardefs.desc: If true, style is a document style

pvardefs.name: pStyleSuper
pvardefs.desc: name of inherited document-style

pvardefs.name: pStyleName
pvardefs.desc: name of this document-style

pvardefs.name: pStyleAfter
pvardefs.desc: name of document-style that is used after this document-style when user hits return

pvardefs.name: pDocument
pvardefs.desc: if true, style is a document style

pvardefs.name: pStyleId
pvardefs.desc: numeric identifyer of the text-style to be applied (one of the kWriStyTxt... constants)

pvardefs.name: pStyleValue
pvardefs.desc: value of the text-style to be applied (data type depends on type of text-style)

pvardefs.name: pIsFirst
pvardefs.desc: if true, this is the first pair in the list

pvardefs.name: pIsLast
pvardefs.desc: if true, this is the last pair in the list

pvardefs.name: pIsDocument
pvardefs.desc: if true, style is a document style

pvardefs.name: pStyleRunStart
pvardefs.desc: character position at which text-run starts

pvardefs.name: pStyleRunEnd
pvardefs.desc: character position at which text-run ends

pvardefs.name: pStyleId
pvardefs.desc: numeric identifyer of the text-style to be applied (one of the kWriStyTxt... constants)

pvardefs.name: pStyleValue
pvardefs.desc: value of the text-style to be applied (data type depends on type of text-style)

pvardefs.name: pIsFirst
pvardefs.desc: if true, this is the first run in the list

pvardefs.name: pIsLast
pvardefs.desc: if true, this is the last run in the list

pvardefs.name: pIsDocument
pvardefs.desc: if true, style is a document style
